reviews.review_msg: Natalia is a kind person, but I feel as though prospective students should be informed on what she endorses. This professor is vocally pro generative AI, to the point that she stated it was mandatory for assignments & to ask it questions class discussions. She encourages pasting chatGPT summaries of material to canvas. I find this morally wrong.

Jacky is an amazing prof and EDUC370 with her was one of the best classes of my 5 years in university. I HIGHLY recommend taking a class with her! She is down to earth and really cares about social justice, which she makes easy to understand in today's world. She uses lots of videos and great examples when teaching to make material relatable.

Good Professor!! Alot of assignments to do, but its not stressful at all! Sadie is very good at clarifying things! I found that it was un-necessary doing 3 types of group presentations.. btw, shes good overall!I would recommend her!! Take it if she is teaching
Horrible Prof, a monkey can teach better than he can. VERY lazy.

Lance was a wonderful prof! His lectures were engaging and on important topics about health. His passion is apparent and cares for his students. There's no exams but instead there's a big unit plan you have to make which will take a lot of time but it's definitely doable.
NICE GUY!! loves what he teaches, his easy going and helpful, again super super nice guy! very understanding and compassionate. I would take a class with him again..his laugh is so cute!
